brief.content-text:
Upon completion of the Introducing Routing and Switching in the Enterprise course, you should be able to:

Implement a LAN for an approved network design.

Configure a switch with V LAN and interswitch communication.

Configure routing protocols on Cisco devices.

Implement access lists to permit or deny specified traffic.

Implement WAN links.

Perform LAN, WAN, and V LAN troubleshooting using a structured methodology and the O S I model.
